row.sql: SELECT OH_Name "Agent", HOST_HTYP_SW "Type", Host_TcpIpAddr "Host IP" from OH, HOST Where OH_Otype='HOST' AND OH_Idnr = HOST_OH_Idnr AND OH_DeleteFlag='0' AND HOST_Active='0' AND HOST_SmLinkFlag='1' AND Host_TcpIpAddr IS NOT NULL
